summary: This is a brief email forwarding an interview with inmate Tartaglione, sent from an associate warden at MCC New York to a superior. It appears to be routine administrative correspondence regarding prison operations.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of an interview document being forwarded between prison officials.

events.title: Interview with Tartaglione
events.description: An interview was conducted with inmate Tartaglione, documented in an attached file.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding an interview with inmate Tartaglione.
The correspondence originates from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The email date is July 24, 2019, and references an interview from the previous day.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, but its direct connection to Jeffrey Epstein is not stated in the provided text.
